greetings.confident: Ah, another guest. What brings you to speak with me?
greetings.gossipy: Oh my, have you heard the latest? There's so much to discuss!
greetings.friendly: Hello there! Lovely party, isn't it? How may I help you?

farewells.nervous: *relief visible* Yes, you too... *looks around anxiously*
farewells.confident: Indeed. May fortune favor you this evening.
farewells.gossipy: Do come back if you hear anything juicy!
farewells.friendly: Of course! Don't be a stranger!

maskResponses.nervous: I try not to stare at people... but yes, many colorful masks tonight.
maskResponses.confident: The masks are quite varied. Gold, silver, red, blue... all manner of colors.
maskResponses.secretive: I pay attention to faces, not masks.
maskResponses.gossipy: Oh yes! There's gold, purple, red... the purple one is particularly mysterious!
maskResponses.aloof: I haven't been looking at masks.
maskResponses.friendly: So many beautiful masks! The red ones stand out, and the gold is quite striking.

behaviorResponses.nervous: Everyone seems... suspicious to me. But that's probably just me.
behaviorResponses.confident: A few guests seem on edge. Nervous types stick out.
behaviorResponses.secretive: I observe, but I don't share observations freely.
behaviorResponses.gossipy: Oh my, yes! Some seem nervous, others too confident for their own good!
behaviorResponses.aloof: People act as they always do. Nothing special.
behaviorResponses.friendly: Most are enjoying themselves! A few seem nervous though.

threatResponses.nervous: *trembles* Please, I'll tell you what I know! {{npc.secret}}
threatResponses.default: Are you threatening me? At a party? How gauche. *backs away*

complimentResponses.friendly: *smiles* How kind! Speaking of masks, have you seen the others? So varied tonight!
complimentResponses.gossipy: *smiles* How kind! Speaking of masks, have you seen the others? So varied tonight!

locationDescriptions.ballroom: The ballroom is the heart of the party, of course. Most guests mingle there.
locationDescriptions.garden: The garden is peaceful. Some prefer the quiet... or the privacy.
locationDescriptions.library: The library attracts the intellectual types. Or those seeking solitude.
locationDescriptions.cellar: The cellar? Strange place for guests, but some venture there for the wine...

mask.blue: a sapphire mask, deep as the sea
mask.green: an emerald mask, like the forest
mask.purple: a purple mask, dark and regal
mask.black: a black mask, shrouded in shadow
mask.white: a white mask, pale as bone

ask_about_guests.speaker: player
ask_about_guests.text: Have you noticed anything interesting about the other guests?

guests_response.speaker: {{npc.name}}
guests_response.fallbackText: I haven't been paying much attention, I'm afraid.

ask_about_masks.speaker: player
ask_about_masks.text: I'm trying to find someone specific. Any distinctive masks you've noticed?

ask_about_locations.speaker: player
ask_about_locations.text: Where do people tend to gather at this party?

threaten.speaker: player
threaten.text: *moves closer menacingly* I think you know more than you're telling me...

compliment.speaker: player
compliment.text: That's a lovely mask you're wearing. It suits you.

farewell.speaker: player
farewell.text: Thank you for your time. Enjoy the party.

mainChoices.text: Ask if anyone is acting strangely

simpleDialogue.nervous: *looks around anxiously* I... I'd rather not talk right now. Please excuse me.
simpleDialogue.confident: I have nothing to discuss with strangers. Good evening.
simpleDialogue.secretive: *turns away slightly* I prefer to keep to myself.
simpleDialogue.gossipy: Oh, I'm just enjoying the atmosphere! Nothing interesting to share, I'm afraid.
simpleDialogue.aloof: *sighs* I'm not in the mood for conversation.
simpleDialogue.friendly: Lovely party! But I really must be going. Enjoy your evening!
